name: OmiWorldGeneratorDemo
description:
Player Movement: 

W -- Forward

A -- Left 

S -- Backwards

D -- Right

Mouse -- Camera

Welcome to the very initial prototyping stages of OMIWRLD. Learning the fundamentals and basics of Unity, the initial prototype includes a character who can run and explore a randomly generated forest. As I continue growing my skills, I aim to take these foundational skills to create an interactive world that serves as a portfolio of my work. The goal is to expand from this initial prototype into creating new worlds and environments that reflect certain projects I’ve worked on. I’m excited to continue expanding on this project and creating a new way of interacting with portfolios.
